title: is there any meaning(or fokelore) to seeing a sprall of mackeral jumping out of the sea very close to the beach
text:
I didnÍt turn up any folklore about mackerel close to the beach.

But there is folklore about ñmackerel scalesî predicting weather. HereÍs a link:
